item.title: Building a Golang App with Github Actions
item.description: In this article, we’ll take a quick look at building a Golang app with Github actions. This process can be applied to just about any app written in any language though. We’ll cover the following: What are github actions? Setting up the workflow to build, test, and deploy a binary Github Actions is a cross-platform CI/CD pipeline that allows you to build, test, package, and release your software. Actions can be triggered manually or based on events that happen within your Github repo.
